titleStmt.title: Israels prayer in time of trouble with Gods gracious answer thereunto, or, An explication of the 14th chapter of the Prophet Hosea in seven sermons preached upon so many days of solemn humiliation / by Edward Reynolds ...
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Newcomb for Robert Bostock ...,
